dict.string: Enable Momentos Don Fernando to control HomeKit enabled devices with your personal account.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access to your camera to upload a photo to use only in your personal profile, in order to personalize your own account.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access your camera roll to upload your photos and save ones you have taken with the app to use only in your personal profile.
This app needs access to microphone.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access your camera roll to upload your photos and save ones you have taken with the app to use only in your personal profile..
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access your location to show how close you are from our restaurants.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access access to calendar usage to you to set your brithday.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to access to your always location to show how close you are from a restaurant.
Enable Momentos Don Fernando to know about your personal information in order to use it in our restaurants to identify you; your data will not be used in any malicious way.
